text: The Milan once had another voice, a penetrating voice. But one day he heard a horse rattle admirably, and he wanted to imitate it. But despite all his attempts, he failed to adopt the horse's voice exactly and also lost his own voice. So he lost his horse's voice and his old voice. Don't imitate others if you don't have the capacity.
title: El milano que quiso relinchar
author: nan Esopo
